text.section: The owner shall designate a master barber to supervise each apprentice barber who is learning to practice barbering in the barbershop.

The owner or a designated master barber shall file monthly a report, on a form supplied by the Board, that:
states the progress of each apprentice barber employed by the barbershop; and
identifies the master barber supervising each apprentice barber.

The owner and the master barber supervising an apprentice barber immediately shall advise the Board in writing of:
the date on which an apprentice barber ceases learning to practice barbering at the barbershop, temporarily or permanently; and
the reason for the cessation.
